scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ seated on a golden throne, holding a globe in his left hand and raising his right hand in a gesture of blessing. He is robed in white with pink accents. Below him, a multitude of figures, possibly angels or the blessed, are gathered. Some are playing musical instruments, including a lute and a portative organ. The background is a deep blue sky with a crescent moon and scattered clouds. The entire scene is framed by an ornate, gilded architectural border with columns and arches, suggesting a divine or heavenly setting.
